description: This file provides a utility function within the Utils namespace to retrieve RFC configuration parameters by calling the external function getRFCParameter. It defines a single inline function getRFCConfig that returns a boolean indicating success.

methods.name: bool getRFCConfig(const char * paramName,RFC_ParamData_t & paramOutput)
methods.description: An inline function that retrieves an RFC parameter by name and indicates success based on the status returned by getRFCParameter.

ctags.name: getRFCConfig
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool getRFCConfig(const char* paramName, RFC_ParamData_t& paramOutput)$/
